trans-unit.source: Specifies the outcome of sending e-mail by using the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 指定通过使用发送电子邮件的结果<xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The values in the SmtpStatusCode enumeration specify reply status values sent by a Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server.
trans-unit.target: SmtpStatusCode 枚举中的值指定简单邮件传输协议 (SMTP) 服务器发送的答复状态值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> classes contain <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> properties that return SmtpStatusCode values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>和<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>类包含<xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>返回 SmtpStatusCode 值的属性。</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: SMTP is defined in RFC 2821 available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 在可用的 RFC 2821 中定义 SMTP [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: The commands were sent in the incorrect sequence.
trans-unit.target: 发送命令的顺序不正确。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The specified user is not local, but the receiving SMTP service accepted the message and attempted to deliver it.
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户不是本地的但接收的 SMTP 服务接受消息，并尝试重新将其传递。

trans-unit.source: This status code is defined in RFC 1123, which is available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 此状态代码定义符合 RFC 1123，位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The client was not authenticated or is not allowed to send mail using the specified SMTP host.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端未经过身份验证或不允许使用指定的 SMTP 主机发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service does not implement the specified command.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务不实现指定的命令。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service does not implement the specified command parameter.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务不实现指定的命令参数。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service does not recognize the specified command.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务无法识别指定的命令。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The message is too large to be stored in the destination mailbox.
trans-unit.target: 消息是太大，无法存储在目标邮箱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The transaction could not occur.
trans-unit.target: 事务可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: You receive this error when the specified SMTP host cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的 SMTP 主机时，你会收到此错误。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: A Help message was returned by the service.
trans-unit.target: 由服务返回帮助消息。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service does not have sufficient storage to complete the request.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务没有足够的存储空间，无法完成请求。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service cannot complete the request.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务无法完成请求。

trans-unit.source: This error can occur if the client's IP address cannot be resolved (that is, a reverse lookup failed).
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端的 IP 地址不能解析可能出现此错误 （即，反向查找失败）。

trans-unit.source: You can also receive this error if the client domain has been identified as an open relay or source for unsolicited e-mail (spam).
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端域已被标识为一个开放中继或未经请求的电子邮件 （垃圾邮件） 的源，还会收到此错误。

trans-unit.source: For details, see RFC 2505, which is available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2505，位于[http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The destination mailbox is in use.
trans-unit.target: 目标邮箱正在使用中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The syntax used to specify the destination mailbox is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定目标邮箱的语法不正确。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The destination mailbox was not found or could not be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 目标邮箱找不到或无法访问。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP server is configured to accept only TLS connections, and the SMTP client is attempting to connect by using a non-TLS connection.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务器配置为仅接受 TLS 连接，和 SMTP 客户端正在尝试使用非 TLS 连接进行连接。

trans-unit.source: The solution is for the user to set EnableSsl=true on the SMTP Client.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是为用户设置 EnableSsl = true; 如果 SMTP 客户端。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The email was successfully sent to the SMTP service.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件已成功发送到 SMTP 服务。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service is closing the transmission channel.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务正在关闭传输通道。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service is not available; the server is closing the transmission channel.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务不可用;服务器正在关闭传输通道。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service is ready.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务已准备就绪。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The SMTP service is ready to receive the e-mail content.
trans-unit.target: SMTP 服务已准备好接收电子邮件内容。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The syntax used to specify a command or parameter is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定的命令或参数的语法不正确。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: A system status or system Help reply.
trans-unit.target: 系统状态或系统帮助答复。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The transaction failed.
trans-unit.target: 事务失败。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The user mailbox is not located on the receiving server.
trans-unit.target: 在接收服务器位于不到用户邮箱。

trans-unit.source: You should resend using the supplied address information.
trans-unit.target: 你应重新发送使用提供的地址信息。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The user mailbox is not located on the receiving server; the server forwards the e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 用户邮箱不位于接收服务器;服务器将转发电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
